mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS crowd_sponsor_#{crowdId} ( sponsor_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, crowd_id INT default #{crowdId}, purchase_id INT NOT NULL, is_deleted BOOL default false )
mapper.select: SELECT sponsor_id AS sponsorId, crowd_id AS crowdId, purchase_id AS purchaseId, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_sponsor_#{crowdId}
SELECT sponsor_id AS sponsorId, crowd_id AS crowdId, purchase_id AS purchaseId, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_sponsor_#{crowdId} WHERE is_deleted = false
SELECT sponsor_id AS sponsorId, crowd_id AS crowdId, purchase_id AS purchaseId, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_sponsor_#{crowdId} WHERE sponsor_id = #{sponsorId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO crowd_sponsor_#{crowdId} (sponsor_id, crowd_id, purchase_id, is_deleted) VALUES (#{sponsorId}, #{crowdId}, #{purchaseId}, #{isDeleted})
